Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI

Class GUIPersonality

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GUIPersonality
public class GUIPersonality extends Object
Class GUIPersonality renders the card image and elements on the screen For each card, a GUIPersonality instance is created
